channel.title: christian-living on Equipped Youth Manual
channel.description: Recent content in christian-living on Equipped Youth Manual

item.title: Ephesians 4:32
item.description: Be kind to one another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, as God in Christ forgave you.

item.title: James 1:19-20
item.description: Know this, my beloved brothers: let every person be quick to hear, slow to speak, slow to anger; for the anger of man does not produce the righteousness of God.
